### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE click_through_rates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    click_date DATE,
    click_time TIME,
    click_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE conversions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    conversion_date DATE,
    conversion_time TIME,
    conversion_count INT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE click_through_rates SET click_count = click_count + 1 WHERE id = 1;
